predicate.note: Frames file for 'coast' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: with Arg1
example.text: After his decisive primary victory over Mayor Edward I. Koch in September , Mr. Dinkins coasted , until recently , on a quite-comfortable lead over his Republican opponent , Rudolph Giuliani , the former crime buster who [*T*-1] has proved a something of a bust as a candidate .
example.arg: After his decisive primary victory over Mayor Edward I. Koch in September
a quite-comfortable lead over his Republican opponent , Rudolph Giuliani , the former crime buster who [*T*-1] has proved a something of a bust as a candidate
